testsuite.name: com.appreciateme.opinion.OpinionControllerTest

testcase.name: [ 3] given not existing opinion id - when GET /opinions/:id - then throw OpinionNotFoundException
[ 9] given Opinion - when PUT /opinions - then returns status OK
[13] given not existing opinion id - when DELETE /opinions/:id - then throw OpinionNotFoundException
[ 4] given List<Opinion> - when GET /opinions/opinionUser/:id - then returns status OK
[ 5] given List<Opinion> - when GET /opinions/reviewedUser/:id - then returns status OK
[ 1] given List<Opinion> - when GET /opinions - then return status OK
[11] given none - when DELETE /opinions - then returns status OK
[ 6] given List<Opinion> - when GET /opinions/date/:date - then returns status OK
[ 10] given opinion with not existing id - when PUT /opinions - then throw OpinionNotFoundException
[ 8] given incorrect opinion - when POST /opinions - then throw IncorrectOpinionException
[ 7] given Opinion - when POST /opinions - then returns status CREATED
[12] given Opinion - when DELETE /opinions/:id - then returns status OK
[ 2] given Opinion - when GET /opinions/:id - then returns status OK
